channel.title: Materials on Intro to R
channel.description: Recent content in Materials on Intro to R

item.title: Class 1: Getting Started - The Basics of R Programming
item.description: Slides here Who is this workshop for? Researchers with little or no experience with R, or those who have gotten rusty and would like a refresher Researchers with a need/interest for using R in their research Who are your instructors? Joy - largely self-taught but avid user of R and other programming languages. Currently use a combination of R, python, bash, and nextflow in my work. Stella – Statistician, experience with Splus (predecessor to R) and R, some python, C++
